price: Ese es el favor y la gracia que Dios les ha concedido. Dios todo lo sabe, es Sabio.
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعۡمَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: faḍlan mina al-lahi waniʿ'matan wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
